meanings.definition: A single-celled organism that lacks a distinct nucleus and other membrane-bound organelles.
meanings.sent1: The procaryote multiplied rapidly in the pond.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the procaryote to understand its structure.
meanings.sent3: The little procaryote tried to hide from the microscope.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cells, the procaryote is like a lone wanderer.
meanings.sent5: Under the lens, the procaryote appeared as a tiny, bustling city.

meanings.definition: Any member of the kingdom Monera, comprising the bacteria and blue-green algae.
meanings.sent1: A procaryote can be found in various environments.
meanings.sent2: The procaryote plays a crucial role in the ecosystem.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous procaryote teased the other microorganisms.
meanings.sent4: In the microscopic world, the procaryote reigns supreme.
meanings.sent5: The procaryote, a tiny powerhouse, thrived in its habitat.
